content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
German

# Target Fragment
narrow alley

# Target Sentence
They disappeared into a narrow alley behind the market

# Context
Vendors were closing their stalls. <sentence>They disappeared into a <fragment>narrow alley</fragment> behind the market</sentence> Rain began to fall lightly.
{"translation":"enge Gasse","sentence_translation":"Sie verschwanden in eine enge Gasse hinter dem Markt"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
German

# Target Fragment
muted colors

# Target Sentence
The painting used muted colors to convey calm

# Context
It depicted a quiet lake at dawn. <sentence>The painting used <fragment>muted colors</fragment> to convey calm</sentence> The frame was simple oak.
{"translation":"gedämpfte Farben","sentence_translation":"Das Gemälde nutzte gedämpfte Farben, um Ruhe zu vermitteln"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
German

# Target Fragment
soft murmur

# Target Sentence
A soft murmur spread through the audience

# Context
The presenter paused to sip water. <sentence>A <fragment>soft murmur</fragment> spread through the audience</sentence> Slides changed slowly on the screen.
{"translation":"leises Murmeln","sentence_translation":"Ein leises Murmeln ging durch das Publikum"}
